extracted_fees.name: Lenders Mortgage Insurance Premium
extracted_fees.explanation: Fee identified as "Lenders Mortgage Insurance". Method stated: "calculated as a percentage of the loan amount" and "The percentage applied will vary depending on a number of factors". Amount/rate not specified. Also stated: "The cost of Lenders Mortgage Insurance premium is passed on to you."

extracted_fees.name: Property Valuer Fee
extracted_fees.explanation: Fee name explicitly stated as: "Property Valuer Fee".

extracted_fees.name: Extra repayments
extracted_fees.explanation: The Additional Info only states: "Extra repayments (up to $30k on fixed loans)" and does not state any fee or charge amount, rate, or range.

extracted_fees.name: Redraw
extracted_fees.explanation: Model returned no extracted fees; recorded fee name only.

extracted_fees.name: Repayment holidays or Reduced Repayments
extracted_fees.explanation: Model returned no extracted fees; recorded fee name only.

extracted_fees.name: Construction loan option
extracted_fees.explanation: Additional Info states: "property valuer fees may apply". No amount, rate, or range is provided.

extracted_fees.name: Portability option
extracted_fees.explanation: The only explicit information provided is: "Portability option (keeping your loan but changing the property securing the loan)". No fee amount, rate, or range is stated.

extracted_fees.name: Loan switching
extracted_fees.explanation: Additional Info states: "Break costs may apply to a fixed rate loan" in the context of "Loan switching (changing loan or repayment type)".
